doc:
Edward Kimball https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Kimball 0 Edward Kimball (June 26, 1859 – January 4, 1938), born Edward Marshall Kimball in Keokuk, Iowa, was an American actor of the silent era. He appeared in 63 films between 1912 and 1936. Like many older actors of the Victorian and Edwardian eras, he enjoyed a varied stage career on and off Broadway before entering the silent films.He was born Edward Marshall Kimball in Keokuk, Iowa and died in Hollywood, California. He was the father of actress Clara Kimball Young in whose films he sometimes appeared. Edward_Kimball ( June_26_,_1859 – January_4_,_1938 ) , born Edward_Marshall_Kimball in Keokuk , Iowa , was an_American_actor of the_silent_era . He appeared in 63_films between 1912_and_1936 . Like many_older_actors of the_Victorian_and_Edwardian_eras , he enjoyed a_varied_stage_career on_and_off Broadway before entering the_silent_films.He was_born Edward_Marshall_Kimball in Keokuk , Iowa and died in Hollywood , California . He was the_father of actress_Clara_Kimball_Young in whose_films he sometimes appeared .
